item.title: [dmu] Defiler of Instinct
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Kavu

First strike

As an additional cost to cast blue permanent spells, you may pay 2 life. Those spells cost {R} less to cast if you paid life this way. This effect reduces only the amount of red mana you pay.

Whenever you cast a red permanent spell, Defiler of Instinct deals 1 damage to any target.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bt523xWqOuc

item.title: [dmu] Nael, Avizoa Aeronaut
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Flying

Domain — Whenever Nael, Avizoa Aeronaut deals combat damage to a player, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order. Then if there are five basic land types among lands you control, draw a card.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TIIAffCpBww
